item.description:
Dance at the MFA

Friday April 6th. 7:00

Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

Avenue of the Arts
465 Huntington Avenue
Boston, Massachusetts 02115-5523
617-267-9300

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Admission: Free with Admission. The MFA event is free. But,only once you pay for a ticket to get into the MFA. The cost late time we did this was $20. But, if you go to your library? You can get a free or discounted ticket through them.

  • This event is free with cost of admission. Cash Bar & Food Available for Purchase
  • Eligibility 21+, Carpooling from: Nashua at 6:00 pm. contact Steve Ob1.

The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at MFA First Fridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and delicious tapas available for purchase. Relax and unwind in a beautiful setting with friends both old and new.

 April 6—DJ Deja ,   Steve Ob1. will be there around 7 pm. and plan to hold a table with a Meetup sign on it by the dance floor. So, join us at any time for an evening of art and dance. Steve will do his best as always to introduce you to as many people as he can find.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Dance at the MFA
